contact_host_if_interested_in_offer: Please contact your host directly if you are interested in any of the offers / services below.
Orshimo is a group of airbnb hosts in Tbilisi offering additional services to the guests to make their stay more memorable and pleasant.
Contact your host directly for any questions or in case you would like to use offered service.
public_transport_question: What is the best way to move around city?
public_transport_answer: In Tbilisi we have municipality busses, underground metro, mini buses and taxis. You can easly get from A to B using municipality transport in the central locations of the city. However, locals' favourite transport still remains to be taxi. It is cheap, reliable and comfortable to move around with taxi especeally for distances over 4 kms
eat_outside_price_question: How much will it cost to eat outside?
eat_outside_price_answer: Average price of a decent Georgian diner at an average restaurant would be 25 Laris per person including drinks. If you want to push your limits price can go up to 50 Laris.
public_transport_price_question: How much does public transport cost?
public_transport_price_answer: If you buy one time ticket it works in Metros and Busses and price is 1 Lari - roughly 35 cents. Price of a taxi ride depends on a distance, time of the day and the car you are ordering. On average one ride within the city will cost you aroung 6 Laris (roughly 1.5 euros).
